'''A Thousand Floating Dreams''' is a [[Weapon Card|Weapon]] [[Catalyst Card|Catalyst]] [[Equipment Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Reaction DMG is increased for the whole team, even if the character to whom it is equipped is not the active character.
* If multiple characters have A Thousand Floating Dreams equipped, the increased Reaction DMG will stack.
